# Crazy Cards w/ TS types

> Solving the Crazy Cards task with just typescript types... it's grim, a lot of type recursion.

Change the parameters: 
1. the `emploment kind`
2. the `income` (income has to be low because TS compiler will complain there's too much recursion).

```ts
                                               // [1]     [2]
type FriendlyMessage = GetAvailableCardsMessage<'student', 21>
//      ^?
```
